summary: The lives of several people, most of them living in the same apartment building, are intertwined between Christmas and New Year's Eve.
cast: Fabio De Luigi|Diego Abatantuono|Cristiana Capotondi|Chiara Francini|Ricky Memphis|Elisa Sednaoui|Ale|Franz|Caterina Guzzanti|Salvatore Caruso|Vincenzo De Michele|Silvia Degrandi|Raffaele Esposito|Alberto Farina|Alessandro Genovesi|Matteo Lanfranchi|Fabrizio Matteini|Astrid Meloni|Mauro Pescio|Gianluca Valente
title: Soap Opera
